surfaces

Class NURBS

  • java.lang.Object
    • surfaces.Surface3D
      • surfaces.NURBS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EditableSurface, Labelizable

    public class NURBS
extends Surface3D
implements EditableSurface
    This class represents NURBS surfaces in 3D space.

        Constructs an empty NURBS surface.

      • NURBS

        public NURBS(int degreeU,
             int degreeV,
             WPoint3D[][] cP,
             double[] knotsU,
             double[] knotsV)
        Constructs a NURBS surface from supplied NURBS data.
        Parameters:
        degreeU - Degree of the surface along the U-direction.
        degreeV - Degree of the surface along the V-direction.
        cP - 2D Matrix of control points. "Control net"
        knotsU - Knot vector for the U-direction.
        knotsV - Knot vector for the V-direction.

        Parameters:
        p1 - First point of the new curve.
        p2 - Second point of the new curve.
        instruct - Direction in which the curve is to be added.
